parameters.name: All
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to remove all tags. Valid values:

*   **true**: yes.
*   **false**: no.

Default value: **false**.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The list of resource IDs. You can specify up to 50 resource IDs in the list.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description: The type of the resources from which you want to remove tags. Set this parameter to **DOMAIN**.

parameters.name: TagKey
parameters.description: The list of tag keys. You can specify up to 20 tag keys in the list.
